data.description: Today we learn how to use git for project management and version control. We learn how to add, commit and push projects to Gitlab, making branches, fixing conflicts, and monitor changes with git.

data.activity: Training - Java Maven and Test Driven Development
data.description: Today we learn how to operate Java with Visual Studio Code using Maven framework, review OOP basics, learn naming conventions, and learn how to code by Test Driven Development (TDD), which focus on defining a test case based on the given use case before coding the solution.
Today we learn how to make custom Exceptions in Java to handle complex use case and handling errors.
Today, we learn how to use a feature in Java 8 called Stream, which updates List using lambda expression, and how to use interface to build custom implementable methods across classes.

Today, we learn how to use Mockito in Java Maven for testing by making mock class to verify method calls. We also learn MongoDB for database management, which is a NoSQL database which handles documents in JSON form instead of relational tables.
Day Off
Day Off

data.activity: Training - Spring Boot and REST API
data.description: Today, we learn how to use Spring Boot framework for making web application in Java, and learn the basic principles of REST API
Today, we learn a new framework called Swagger.io, which can be used to test our API with built-in user interface via localhost.

data.activity: Training - Swagger.io and MongoDB + Spring Boot
data.description: Today, we continued learning swagger.io to test out REST API, and we learn how to integrate MongoDB as our database and Spring Boot as our backend and API management.
Today, we learn how to make relationships between documents and collections by using concepts like one-to-one and on-to-many in MongoDB, and learn to integrate it in Java.
Today, we continued our lesson on MongoDB relationships, adding new use cases to test and solve. Today we also learn how to use Docker to support compatibility between different environments.
Day Off
Day Off
Today, we learn about JavaScript Fundamental, where we learn the basics of JavaScript, testing in JavaScript, ESLint, Babel, Node.js dan npm.
Today we learn about javascript, specifically on asynchronous programming, and the basics of React.js (render component, testing and basic UI)

data.activity: Training - React.js Testing and Stateful Component
data.description: Today, we learn about React.js, specifically on how to do testing in frontend, and the concept of stateful component.

data.activity: Training - React.js and HTTP Request with Axios
data.description: Today, we continue to learn about React.js, and HTTP request to get data from server with Axios.

data.activity: Training - React.js HTTP Request with Axios and Router
data.description: Today, we continue to learn on using Axios for performing HTTP Request, and the use of router in React to navigate in the app.
Day Off
Day Off

Today, we started our first day for our mini project; to develop a retrospective board with React and Java Spring Boot. For day one, me and my partner started working on one feature, to create card in a section.

Today, me and my partner continued the development for the previous feature. We fixed bugs regarding backend not updating section properly when creating new card, and adding testing for these features
Today, we started handling new features, which is to add like in each cards to rate inputs from users. Me and my partner started working on adding the new feature.
Today, me and my partner fixed the bugs that appear on our previous features, refactor the feature, and continued working on a new feature, which is to sort the cars in a section based on likes.

Today, we finished most of our features in the team, so we continued by doing minor adjustments on the user interface and add missing testing for each features to enhance test coverage of the application. The last half of the day is spent on presenting our project to our trainers, supervisors, HR and heads of respective divisions.
Day Off
Day Off

Today, we learn about Express.js, a backend framework based on Node.js. We learn how it works, learn to integrate it with existing database based on our previous project, and learn to migrate our project's backend from Java Spring Boot to Express.js.
Today, we continued our training on Express.js, where we learn how to do HTTP requests like GET and POST in Express.js and learn how to make validations when handling POST using schema.

data.activity: Training - Agile, Scrum, and BTPN IT Infrastructure Introduction
data.description: Today, we learn the basics of agile, and scrum. Then, we continued the session with introduction to IT Infrastructure in BTPN. We do a video conference for this session due to work from home.

data.activity: Training - Digital Infrastructure, Networking and Storage
data.description: Today, we got an overview of digital infrastructure in BTPN, we learn their practice in Infrastructure as a Service (IAAS) and Platform as a Service (PAAS), we are introduced with their network and storage management softwares like Openstack, Morpheus and Prodigy.
Today, we learn about IT automation in BTPN. We were introduced to RedHat Ansible, an IT automation platform to deploy applications and manage speed productivity in an enterprise level.
Day Off
Day Off

data.activity: Training - Kanban and Monitoring with Solarwind and Elastick
data.description: Today, we learn how to use kanban, and learn the difference between kanban and scrum method. We also learn how to use Solarwind and Elastick for monitoring purpose.

Today, we were assigned to a quiz for reviewing what we have learned for a week in IT Infrastructure division. We were asked basic IT Infrastructure concepts like netowrking, stoage IT automation and monitoring, as well as soft skill problems regarding agile.
Nyepi Holiday

Today, we were split into three groups to use Docker for creating virtual images of the assigned open source project; Gitlab, Wordpress and MediaWiki. I was assigned in MediaWiki team, and our job today is to containerise MediaWiki with Docker in Windows and MacOS to ensure it is accessible in different environments.

Today, I tried fixing problems with installation of MediaWiki in my system and managed to fixed it. We then tried to separate the volume for app usage and database usage, to ensure data accessibility on app failure.
Day Off
Day Off
Today, we tried fixing dependency problems and tried adding new features like backup capabilities and connecting to mysql database
Today, we fixed issues on backup capabilities and fixed issues for the application to work on everyone's devices.

Today, we do a sprint review to evaluate our final progress of this sprint, get an update on what have we done, and do retrospective to evaluate our team progress and see what went well, what can be improved, and how to improve on upcoming projects
Today, we try to add new features which enables admin to track user activities in one dashboard.
Today, we continue to work on the new features which enables admin to track user activities in one dashboard.
Day Off
Day Off
Today, we continued adding support to the dashboard for monitoring to MediaWiki
Today, we continue doing finishing touch on the dashboard, and an additional task to prepare for a sharing session on the topic "Microservice".
Today, we finished the sprint by wrapping up, present the application, and evaluate our team. Then we continued with the sharing session we prepared yesterday about "Microservice"
Today, we start a new sprint, we roll the team's scrum master and product owner, were assigned with a new assignment to finish for the next sprint
Good Friday Holiday
Day Off
Day Off
Today we continue our third sprint. We work on making the data in MediaWiki accessible by API with Parsoid

Today we continue our third sprint. We work on making the data in MediaWiki accessible by API with Parsoid, so that it is accessible by Graphana, so that it can be presented for tomorrow's sprint review
Today, we tried to connect Graphana with our API, but some issues are present. We continue the day with sprint review to report our progress.
Today, we started a new sprint, where we continue to fix previous issue by making a simple interface with react to view the logs, and move on to our new task to scale up mediawiki
Today, we continue to work on scaling up MediaWiki by using nginx. We tried researching nginx to figure out how to implement it in our project
Day Off
Day Off
Today, we continue to work on scaling up MediaWiki by using nginx. We tried configuring nginx to  implement it in our project
Today, we finalize our project, present it to our mentor, and wrapped up the project. Next, we were placed in our new squads.
Today we go to the office to get our laptops and install all the necessary softwares and enable access to BTPN network
A new batch of interns take their laptops from the office, those who have take their laptops get a day off for preparation
A new batch of interns take their laptops from the office, those who have take their laptops get a day off for preparation
Day Off
Day Off

data.activity: Integral - Agile Introduction and Integral Introduction
data.description: Today, we were assigned to a new project called Integral. We were introduced with how they implement agile, and a brief introduction on what is Integral

Today, we were introduced with the specific features in Integral (Integrated Personal Growth Application), like Integral Growth; for reviewing productivity of peers, and TalentX; for talent search and placement workflows

Today, we join Kyoto Squad's (a team in Integral) sprint planning. We observe how they process and breakdown stories into specific details, scoring the difficulty level, and for small pairs to fix the problems
Today, we were split into small groups to observe how the developers work on each story. We were given a glimpse of how they work  to understand the code base and how they solve the problems
International Labor Day
Day Off
Day Off

Today we continue to observe how the team work on solving stories. We are trying to add a feature to submit recruitment form, uploading CV, and make sure they’re properly passed to backend and database
Today we continue to observe how the team work on solving stories. We tried to make the frontend to show list of applicance in one table, with additional features to filter applicance
Today, we continue on previous task, where we integrate backend and frontend for form submission, and file submission
Waisak Holiday
Today, we continue to integrate the frontend and backend, add new tests on the code and learn more about React Hooks
Day Off
Day Off
Today, we finished our feature by completely integrating both frontend and backend, merged and deployed as a feature for the project.
Today, we tried to setup our laptops to configure and install additional softwares. We also conclude the sprint with retrospective and talk about stories for the next sprint
Today we start a new sprint by doing sprint planning, discussing on new features, scale the difficulties, and defining subtasks on each features
Today I go back to office to reconfigure my laptop, upgrade my OS and reinstall softwares necessary for WFH
Today, we were assigned to stories with bugs regarding checkbox usability and incorrect string output, and we arr working to fix that problem
Day Off
Day Off

Today, we continue to work on the bug we were assigned to. In the process we also tried to fix new issues that shows up regarding version of a package. We also find an issue in pushing updates to the recovery, and will continue to work on it tomorrow
Today, we continue to work on the bug, resolve bugs found yesterday, and finally merged our bug fix.

Today, we helped other teams to solve their issues, help other team to finish their feature, and discuss in-depth about Sinau, an event organising app used for the developer communities in BTPN to held sharing session and trainings.
Holiday
Cuti Bersama
Day Off
Day Off
Idul Fitri Holiday
Today we continue to help other team fix their bugs and issues, and reconfigure some settings in intelij to match other's settings
Today we start a new sprint by doing pair review to see each pairs progress, do sprint planning to plan for the whole sprint, and rearrange pairs for this sprint
Today, we start working on adding a search bar to help user to search candidates with specific status. We have implemented basic use case and test for today.
Today, we continue to add functionalities to the search bar, add tests, and fix how the search bar looks in the page.
Day Off
Day Off
